# Section 5 **Secondary Analysis of Big Data (Numeric Data)**

**Abstract:** This section reviews how to access data that is primarily numeric/quantitative in nature, but from a different source and of a different nature than the data typically used by social scientists. Example data sets include international or national large-scale assessments (e.g., PISA, NAEP) and data from digital technologies (e.g., log-trace data from adaptive mathematics programs).Â
